title: is it me or is everyone who is ranked 80% boosted?
body: I know what your thinking wow QQ thread just another shitter complaining. Here me out. Every single game I get people doing the wierdest shit with biuld like getting a tear on the jungler or something else strange. I also take a look at my teammates match history 70% of them are low silver or mid silver  and have gold MMR. Wierd right? I see their history and they have most of them 40% winrate. I know some may be regular players but HOLY either lots of players are boosted or are smurfs or they just got really lucky getting to gold MMR.

replies.body:
No, people just have bad games. Then people flame them which causes them to play even worse

If you're wondering why you are getting matched with Silvers, its because your MMR is Silver 2

> [{quoted}](name=Eedat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BmRGb1Pz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-31T01:08:31.082+0000)
>
> No, people just have bad games. Then people flame them which causes them to play even worse
> 
> If you're wondering why you are getting matched with Silvers, its because your MMR is Silver 2

Did you not read the post? I said I am being matched with low silvers who shit the bed like they are still 5 years old.

Not boosted, just bad.

Anything under high gold is basically a random mix of unranked (placements), bronze, silver and gold players. It has been this way all season, riot broke stuff.
Actually boosted players would be Gold with Silver MMR, more likely.
